title: Must Read: The Risks and Benefits of Selling to Saks, SoulCycle Aims to Open Standalone Stores
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Friday. Gary Wassner, CEO of Hilldun Corp, a factoring company that helps smooth out cash flow for brands, spoke with WWD about his insights on Saks Global's new payment terms, its plans to pay past-due bills and the integration of ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
